notification

Class EmailNotification

  • java.lang.Object
    • notification.EmailNotification

  • public class EmailNotification
extends java.lang.Object
    Email notification for reporting build output to associated repository committer. The email body contains an HTML-based summary of the build output. If visible, the email will be sent to the email associated with the account that made the last commit.
    Since:
    2021-02-08

    • Method Detail

      • send

        public void send(java.lang.Boolean status,
                 RepositoryDetails repositoryDetails)
        Initializes, authenticates, creates and sends a new email. If anny step fails the email is not sent and the error message is outputted on the console.
        Parameters:
        status - the status of the build and test execution of the repository if true then build was successful otherwise build failed
        repositoryDetails - the details of the repository on which the build was performed
        See Also:
        RepositoryDetails
